languages.text: Гордость Сантиэля — мир, принадлежащий династии Чорда, — был атакован зловредными ксеносами друкари. Вскоре после сообщения о рейде связь с системой была потеряна. С тех пор оттуда не пришел ни один корабль.

Santiel's Pride, a world that is part of House Chorda's domain, was attacked by the vicious Drukhari. Soon after word of the raid was sent, the system went silent. Not a single ship has come from it since.
languages.original_text: Гордость Сантиэля — мир, принадлежащий династии Чорда, — был атакован зловредными ксеносами друкари. Вскоре после сообщения о рейде связь с системой была потеряна. С тех пор оттуда не пришел ни один корабль.

traits.locale_text: Santiel's Pride, a world that is part of House Chorda's domain, was attacked by the vicious Drukhari. Soon after the word was sent, the system went silent. Not a single ship has come from it since.

Santiel's Pride, a world that is part of House Chorda's domain, was attacked by the vicious Drukhari. Soon after word of the raid was sent, the system went silent. Not a single ship has come from it since.

languages.text: La Gloire de Santiel, un monde du domaine de la maison Chorda, a été attaquée par les terribles Drukharis. Peu après que l'alerte a été donnée, les communications ont cessé. Depuis, aucun vaisseau n'a décollé de sa surface.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride, a world that is part of House Chorda's domain, was attacked by the vicious Drukhari. Soon after word of the raid was sent, the system went silent. Not a single ship has come from it since.

traits.locale_text: La Gloire de Santiel, un monde du domaine de la maison Chorda, a été attaquée par les terribles Drukharis. Peu après que l'alerte a été donnée, les communications ont cessé. Depuis, aucun vaisseau n'a décollé de sa surface.

languages.text: 桑提尔之傲是库尔达王朝的领地。这个世界遭到了邪恶黑暗灵族的袭击，袭击开始后不久，整个星系就失去了联系。在那之后，再也没有任何一艘飞船从这个星系来过。
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride, a world that is part of House Chorda's domain, was attacked by the vicious Drukhari. Soon after word of the raid was sent, the system went silent. Not a single ship has come from it since.

traits.locale_text: 桑提尔之傲是库尔达王朝的领地。这个世界遭到了邪恶黑暗灵族的袭击，袭击开始后不久，整个星系就失去了联系。在那之后，再也没有任何一艘飞船从这个星系来过。

languages.text: チョーダ家の領域であるサンティエル・プライドは、凶暴なデュカーリによる襲撃を受けた。襲撃の知らせが届いて間もなく、星系は沈黙した。それ以来、この星系からは一隻の船も出ていない。
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride, a world that is part of House Chorda's domain, was attacked by the vicious Drukhari. Soon after word of the raid was sent, the system went silent. Not a single ship has come from it since.

traits.locale_text: チョーダ家の領域であるサンティエル・プライドは、凶暴なデュカーリによる襲撃を受けた。襲撃の知らせが届いて間もなく、星系は沈黙した。それ以来、この星系からは一隻の船も出ていない。

languages.text: Santiels Stolz, eine Welt, die zum Reich von Haus Chorda gehört, wurde von den brutalen Drukhari angegriffen. Kurz nach der Nachricht von dem Angriff ist das System verstummt. Seitdem ist kein einziges Schiff von dort gekommen.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride, a world that is part of House Chorda's domain, was attacked by the vicious Drukhari. Soon after word of the raid was sent, the system went silent. Not a single ship has come from it since.

traits.locale_text: Santiels Stolz, eine Welt, die zum Reich von Haus Chorda gehört, wurde von den brutalen Drukhari angegriffen. Kurz nach der Nachricht von dem Angriff ist das System verstummt. Seitdem ist kein einziges Schiff von dort gekommen.

languages.text: Orgullo de Santiel, un mundo en los dominios de la casa Chorda, ha sido atacado por los salvajes Drukhari. Poco después de que llegara el mensaje de la incursión, el sistema calló. No ha llegado ni una nave de ese planeta desde entonces.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride, a world that is part of House Chorda's domain, was attacked by the vicious Drukhari. Soon after word of the raid was sent, the system went silent. Not a single ship has come from it since.

traits.locale_text: Orgullo de Santiel, un mundo en los dominios de la casa Chorda, ha sido atacado por los salvajes Drukhari. Poco después de que llegara el mensaje de la incursión, el sistema calló. No ha llegado ni una nave de ese planeta desde entonces.

languages.text: Chorda Hanesi'nin bölgesinde bulunan bir dünya olan Santiel'in Gururu, tehlikeli Drukharilerin saldırısına uğradı. Baskına dair haberlerin gönderilmesinin ardından sistem sessizliğe gömüldü. O zamandan bu zamana dek oradan tek bir gemi dahi çıkmadı.
languages.original_text: Santiel's Pride, a world that is part of House Chorda's domain, was attacked by the vicious Drukhari. Soon after word of the raid was sent, the system went silent. Not a single ship has come from it since.
